answers.answer: It could be an allergy or a reaction to something. Go see the doctor before it gets worse.

question: Hi,I'm a type 1 diabetic and 6 weeks ago i started getting very painful/sensitive skin around my boobs, pelvic area, and my thighs...the pain is now going down to my lower legs....Clothing brushing up against it is very painful..feels like a sunburn...PLEASE HELP!  There is no rash or anything visible, the pain is sistributed evenly on both sides, i also have a mild cough which started about the same time.....any ideas? is this diabetes related???? i'm so lost.... and pls don't tell me i mite be pregnant cause i'm not.
title: Skin sensitive/pain/burning
